鴚字的基本解释

鴚
gē
鸿雁：“若见江南苍鴚。”

鴚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gē］
［《廣韻》古俄切，平歌，見。］
［《集韻》居牙切，平麻，見。］
野鹅。今名鸿雁。

鴚字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鴚； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1485第26
【唐韻】古俄切【集韻】居河切【韻會】【正韻】居何切，?音歌。【說文】鴚，䳘也。【爾雅·釋鳥】舒鴈䳘。【註】禮記曰：出如舒鴈。今江東呼鴚。又【玉篇】居牙切，音加。與駕同。亦䳘也。

鴚字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
鴚字的起名意思

鸿雁。

鴚
Basic explanation of words
鴚
gē
Hongyan: "If you see Jiangnan Cangying."
鴚
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gē］
["Guangyun" ancient Russian cut, flat song, see you. ]
["Jiyun" is cut in teeth, plain hemp, see. ]
Wild goose. Today's name is Hongyan.
鴚
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鴚; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1485 Page 26
[Tang Yun] Ancient Russian Cut [Ji Yun] Juhe Cut [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Where is the home cut? Sound song. 【Said Wen】Bing, Hai Ye. 【Erya·Shiniao】Shu Yanbo. [Note] The Book of Rites says: Go out like Shu Yan. Today Jiangdong Huying. Also 【Jade Articles】The teeth are cut, and the sound is added. Same as driving. It's also too.
